content.about: Prestige Estate Services provides professional antique appraisal services specializing in Artwork. With Established business experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the Omaha area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Nancy T.
reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. Their expertise with my antique pocket watch collection was impressive.

reviews.author: Michael J.
reviews.content: Prestige Estate Services's knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

reviews.author: Linda A.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and they delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

reviews.author: Emily T.
reviews.content: The antique appraisal was thorough, but I found their pricing a bit high compared to others.

reviews.author: Emily A.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of antique furniture values was exceptional. The documentation they provided was detailed and perfect for my insurance needs.

content.about: Borsheims Fine Jewelry & Gifts provides professional antique appraisal services specializing in Artwork. With Established business experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the Omaha area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Robert J.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.author: Emily D.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of antique furniture values was exceptional. The documentation they provided was detailed and perfect for my insurance needs.

reviews.author: James R.
reviews.content: Extremely professional and knowledgeable about antique valuation. The appraisal was thorough and delivered on time.

reviews.author: Patricia J.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and they delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

content.about: Omaha Antique Appraisals provides professional antique appraisal services in the Omaha area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.
